cards.name: Ashling, the Limitless
cards.text:
Elemental permanent spells you cast from your hand gain evoke {4} as you cast them. (If you cast a spell for its evoke cost, it's sacrificed when it enters.)
Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken Elemental, create a token that's a copy of it. The token gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice it unless you pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

cards.name: Auntie Ool, Cursewretch
cards.text:
Ward-Blight 2. (To blight 2, a player puts two -1/-1 counters on a creature they control.)
Whenever one or more -1/-1 counters are put on a creature, draw a card if you control that creature. If you don't control it, its controller loses 1 life.

cards.name: Mass of Mysteries
cards.text:
First strike, vigilance, trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target Elemental you control gains myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token copy that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

cards.flavor: Harrowed but still harrowing.
cards.name: The Reaper, King No More
cards.text:
When The Reaper enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Do this only once each turn.

cards.name: Belonging
cards.text:
When this creature enters, create three 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature tokens with changeling. (They're every creature type.)
Encore {6}{W}{W} ({6}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Subterfuge
cards.text:
When this creature enters, target creature gains flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards" until end of turn.
Encore {7}{U}{U} ({7}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Shadowmoor is rife with wild magic-powerful but as volatile as the plane itself.
cards.name: Aberrant Return
cards.text: Put one, two, or three target creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Each of them enters with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: Ajani's heart went out to those changed by the aurora's tides. Having selfhood ripped away was still a painfully familiar feeling.
cards.name: Eventide's Shadow
cards.text: Remove any number of counters from among permanents on the battlefield. You draw cards and lose life equal to the number of counters removed this way.

cards.name: Grave Venerations
cards.text:
When this enchantment enters, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Lamentation
cards.text:
When this creature enters, destroy target creature an opponent controls. You gain 3 life.
Encore {6}{B}{B} ({6}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Oft-Nabbed Goat
cards.text:
{1}: Draw a card. Gain control of this creature and put a -1/-1 counter on it. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only as a sorcery.
When this creature dies, if it had one or more -1/-1 counters on it, its owner draws that many cards and each other player loses that much life.

cards.flavor: It is accompanied by the agonized squeals of faeries caught in its sap.
cards.name: Sinister Gnarlbark
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card and blight 1. (Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.)

cards.name: Impulsivity
cards.text:
When this creature enters, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
Encore {7}{R}{R} ({7}{R}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Village Pillagers
cards.text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a counter on it dies, you create a tapped Treasure token.

cards.name: Elemental Spectacle
cards.text: Vivid - Create a number of 5/5 red and green Elemental creature tokens equal to the number of colors among permanents you control. Then you gain life equal to the number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Ferrafor, Young Yew
cards.text:
When Ferrafor enters, create a number of 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens equal to the number of counters among creatures target player controls.
{T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target creature.

cards.name: Jubilation
cards.text:
When this creature enters, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
Encore {7}{G}{G} ({7}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Puca's Covenant
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it dies, you may return another target permanent card with mana value less than or equal to the number of counters on that creature from your graveyard to your hand. Do this only once each turn.

cards.flavor:
"Come into the light, strange one. All are welcome to bask in Eirdu's glow."
-Kithkin rite-leader
cards.name: Springleaf Parade
cards.text:
When this enchantment enters, create X 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature tokens with changeling. (They're every creature type.)
Creature tokens you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor:
"I told you not to build it with blighted wood."
-Lysh, kithkin wickersmith
cards.name: Dread Tiller
cards.text:
When this creature enters, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Wickersmith's Tools
cards.text:
Whenever one or more -1/-1 counters are put on a creature, put a charge counter on this artifact.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create X tapped 2/2 colorless Scarecrow artifact creature tokens, where X is the number of charge counters on this artifact.

cards.name: Abundant Countryside
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
{6}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. (It's every creature type.)

cards.flavor: A forest that never thirsts always flourishes.
cards.name: Rain-Slicked Copse
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Lorwyn contains many such places: not bustling, not frenetic, but teeming with life in their own, quiet way.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Sodden Verdure
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor: In far-off Shadowmoor, her kin lifted their heads to a refrain they could not hear.
cards.name: Distant Melody
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

cards.flavor: Blowflies only infest corpses, but if none are available, they have no trouble making some.
cards.name: Blowfly Infestation
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, if it had a -1/-1 counter on it, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.flavor: No one asked the springjack what it wanted.
cards.name: Hoarder's Greed
cards.text: You lose 2 life and draw two cards, then clash with an opponent. If you win, repeat this process. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on their choice of the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a greater mana value.)

cards.flavor: A swarm ever grows in its wake.
cards.name: Necroskitter
cards.text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: A haunted husk of bark, its cursed whispers linger on the wind.
cards.name: Tree of Perdition
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Exchange target opponent's life total with this creature's toughness.

cards.name: Fury
cards.text:
Double strike
When this creature enters, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
Evoke-Exile a red card from your hand.

cards.name: Endurance
cards.text:
Flash
Reach
When this creature enters, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order.
Evoke-Exile a green card from your hand.

cards.flavor: "You, toadlet! Bring me a goblet of your bog's finest fire-slug slime!"
cards.name: Ignoble Hierarch
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

cards.flavor: Faeries trade trinkets for tales, growing their knowledge and his collection.
cards.name: Faeburrow Elder
cards.text:
Vigilance
This creature gets +1/+1 for each color among permanents you control.
{T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

cards.flavor: "No matter our differences, one thing we agree on: It ends in fire."
cards.name: Fire Covenant
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

cards.flavor: Eirdu's adherents invoke its blessings with jingling bells and dancing feet. Where there is joy, there is the warmth of the sun.
cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: Isilu's adherents invoke its blessings with contemplation at sites marked by standing stones. Where there is quiet, there is the moon's inspiration.
cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor:
"Meadowlarks sing in sun-touched skies
And breezes kiss where Eirdu lies."
-Verselet of Lorwyn
cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor:
"Wanderers creep 'neath dark moonrise
And wildness seethes where Isilu lies."
-Verselet of Shadowmoor
cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor:
"The Path of Flame is a flamekin's most personal journey. You must walk it for yourself, but you'll never walk alone."
-Zasharua, Brighthearth mentor
cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: The boggarts' construction methods were chaotic and reckless, but the resulting tower became the envy of Rotbog warren.
cards.name: Command Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.flavor: Life is nothing more than decay postponed.
cards.name: Festering Thicket
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Secluded Courtyard
cards.text:
As this land enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.

cards.flavor: Shadowmoor contains many such places: not evil, not malevolent, but pulsing with something bitter and eldritch.
cards.name: Vernal Fen
cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Hoofprints of the Stag
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, you may put a hoofprint counter on this enchantment.
{2}{W}, Remove four hoofprint counters from this enchantment: Create a 4/4 white Elemental creature token with flying. Activate only during your turn.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: When the gods go to war, mortals pay the highest price.
cards.name: Shatter the Sky
cards.text: Each player who controls a creature with power 4 or greater draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Reality Shift
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

cards.name: Slithermuse
cards.text:
When this creature leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.
Evoke {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Archfiend of Ifnir
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle or discard another card, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature your opponents control.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
"Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection."
-Geth, Lord of the Vault
cards.name: Black Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: Every contagion has a host.
cards.name: Carnifex Demon
cards.text:
Flying
This creature enters with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{B}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.

cards.flavor: They spawn from shadow, wreaking chaos until shadow claims them again.
cards.name: Dusk Urchins
cards.text:
Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
When this creature dies, draw a card for each -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: Death in form and function.
cards.name: Grave Titan
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

cards.name: Haunting Voyage
cards.text:
Choose a creature type. Return up to two creature cards of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was foretold, return all creature cards of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield instead.
Foretell {5}{B}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

cards.flavor: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.
cards.name: Incremental Blight
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

cards.flavor: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.
cards.name: Infernal Grasp
cards.text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Liliana, Death Wielder
cards.text:
[+2]: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
[−3]: Destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.
[−10]: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "'Did I do it?' You'll have to be more specific."
cards.name: Massacre Girl, Known Killer
cards.text:
Menace
Creatures you control have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if its toughness was less than 1, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Many have heard the beginning of its low, sustained shriek but few the end.
cards.name: Midnight Banshee
cards.text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on each nonblack creature.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?"
-Vraska
cards.name: Night's Whisper
cards.text: You draw two cards and lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.
cards.name: Painful Truths
cards.text: Converge - You draw X cards and lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

cards.flavor: In the tight-knit doun of Mistmeadow, death is less important than duty.
cards.name: Persist
cards.text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Puppeteer Clique
cards.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Shriekmaw
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When this creature enters, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
-Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
cards.name: Skinrender
cards.text: When this creature enters, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

cards.flavor: They once sought to unite with the flame of transcendence. Now they seek only to extinguish the lights of others.
cards.name: Soul Snuffers
cards.text: When this creature enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

cards.name: Vraska, Betrayal's Sting
cards.text:
Compleated ({B/P} can be paid with {B} or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.)
[0]: You draw a card and lose 1 life. Proliferate.
[−2]: Target creature becomes a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color" and loses all other card types and abilities.
[−9]: If target player has fewer than nine poison counters, they get a number of poison counters equal to the difference.

cards.flavor:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
-Thalia, Knight-Cathar
cards.name: Blasphemous Act
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

cards.flavor: "Leave behind the sorrow of this body. Be blessed, being of light."
cards.name: Cathartic Pyre
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Cathartic Pyre deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

cards.flavor: The soldier had given up his wealth, his title, even his home, but he had no room for regret. At last, he had saved his friend.
cards.name: Cathartic Reunion
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
-Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain
cards.name: Chain Reaction
cards.text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

cards.name: Descendants' Fury
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice one of them. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with the sacrificed creature. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Incandescent Soulstoke
cards.text:
Other Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{R}, {T}: You may put an Elemental creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."
cards.name: Ingot Chewer
cards.text:
When this creature enters, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.flavor: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."
cards.name: Smokebraider
cards.text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.

cards.name: Abundant Growth
cards.text:
Enchant land
When this Aura enters, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

cards.name: Avenger of Zendikar
cards.text:
When this creature enters, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

cards.flavor: It sees shaped stone and carved wood as mutilations.
cards.name: Bane of Progress
cards.text: When this creature enters, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each permanent destroyed this way.

cards.name: Cavalier of Thorns
cards.text:
Reach
When this creature enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a land card from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.
When this creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, put another target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.name: Channeler Initiate
cards.text:
When this creature enters, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature you control.
{T}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Cream of the Crop
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control enters, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's power. If you do, put one of those cards on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.
cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."
cards.name: Devoted Druid
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature: Untap this creature.

cards.flavor: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."
cards.name: Evolution Sage
cards.text: Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.flavor: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.
cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: Many horrors take the bait of brave elf volunteers walking alone, only to fall to the blades of rescuers lurking nearby.
cards.name: Flourishing Defenses
cards.text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

cards.flavor: The castle finally got vengeance for enduring years of royally bad taste.
cards.name: Foundation Breaker
cards.text:
When this creature enters, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Garruk's Uprising
cards.text:
When this enchantment enters, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
Creatures you control have trample. (Each of those creatures can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater enters, draw a card.

cards.name: Greenwarden of Murasa
cards.text:
When this creature enters, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
When this creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Animals commune with their environment without the need for language. Theirs is a fundamental connection that surpasses flimsy words."
-Vivien Reid
cards.name: Harmonize
cards.text: Draw three cards.

cards.name: Kindred Summons
cards.text: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

cards.flavor:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
-Dosan the Falling Leaf
cards.name: Kodama's Reach
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Realmwalker
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As this creature enters, choose a creature type.
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

cards.flavor: "The curse is broken."
cards.name: Return of the Wildspeaker
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.
• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Selvala, Heart of the Wilds
cards.text:
Whenever another creature enters, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power.
{G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

cards.name: Titan of Industry
cards.text:
Reach, trample
When this creature enters, choose two -
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target player gains 5 life.
• Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
• Put a shield counter on a creature you control.

cards.flavor: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."
cards.name: Wickerbough Elder
cards.text:
This creature enters with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"Not just any floriculturist can grow this caliber of nightbloom. We're looking for a rooftop hothouse with quite particular conditions."
-Dr. A of the Foundway Associates
cards.name: Assassin's Trophy
cards.text: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Binding the Old Gods
cards.text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I - Destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
II - Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
III - Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.flavor: When night fell, the plane itself was scarred.
cards.name: Everlasting Torment
cards.text:
Players can't gain life.
Damage can't be prevented.
All damage is dealt as though its source had wither. (A source with wither deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

cards.name: Glissa Sunslayer
cards.text:
First strike, deathtouch
Whenever Glissa Sunslayer deals combat damage to a player, choose one -
• You draw a card and lose 1 life.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Remove up to three counters from target permanent.

cards.flavor: Her subtle smile is suffused with venom.
cards.name: Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons
cards.text:
Whenever Hapatra deals combat damage to a player, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token with deathtouch.

cards.flavor: Even the oldest treefolk was but an acorn when Lorwyn's first mysteries were born.
cards.name: Horde of Notions
cards.text:
Vigilance, trample, haste
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may play target Elemental card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Jegantha, the Wellspring
cards.text:
Companion - No card in your starting deck has more than one of the same mana symbol in its mana cost. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

cards.flavor: Mounted cinders circle the blasted peak at Kulrath, hunting the Extinguisher.
cards.name: Kulrath Knight
cards.text:
Flying
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Creatures your opponents control with counters on them can't attack or block.

cards.name: Maelstrom Wanderer
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order. Then do it again.)

cards.flavor:
"My child grew from rot and ruin, yet she bloomed."
-Multani
cards.name: Muldrotha, the Gravetide
cards.text: During each of your turns, you may play a land and cast a permanent spell of each permanent type from your graveyard. (If a card has multiple permanent types, choose one as you play it.)

cards.name: Omnath, Locus of Rage
cards.text:
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, create a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token.
Whenever Omnath or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Omnath, Locus of the Roil
cards.text:
When Omnath enters, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Elementals you control.
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target Elemental you control. If you control eight or more lands, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."
-Cevraya, Golgari shaman
cards.name: Putrefy
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"No, not 'washed' ashore. It walked ashore."
-Shafring Hulm, beachcomber
cards.name: Risen Reef
cards.text: Whenever this creature or another Elemental you control enters, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand.

cards.name: The Scorpion God
cards.text:
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
{1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that."
-Taani, berserker of Etlan
cards.name: Terminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: It is spring incarnate, its gentle warmth chasing away the last of winter's bite.
cards.name: Vernal Sovereign
cards.text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This token's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

cards.flavor:
"Yarok grieves within the waste
Of Bala Ged's corrupted land."
-Lament for Bala Ged, stanza 1
cards.name: Yarok, the Desecrated
cards.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
If a permanent entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

cards.name: Chimil, the Inner Sun
cards.text:
Spells you control can't be countered.
At the beginning of your end step, discover 5. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 5 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

cards.flavor: By guild tradition, any puddle of multicolored light on the cobblestones can serve as neutral ground.
cards.name: Chromatic Lantern
cards.text:
Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.
cards.name: Commander's Sphere
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Contagion Clasp
cards.text:
When this artifact enters, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.flavor:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
-Mairsil, the Pretender
cards.name: Fellwar Stone
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

cards.flavor: Beware a scarecrow bearing gifts-especially sloshing vessels of acid.
cards.name: Grim Poppet
cards.text:
This creature enters with three -1/-1 counters on it.
Remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.

cards.flavor: Urza exploited nature to power his war machines; in time, nature exploited his war machines to renew itself.
cards.name: Timeless Lotus
cards.text:
Timeless Lotus enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

cards.flavor: Built in honor of Alara's creatures, the ziggurat vanished long ago. When Progenitus awakened, the temple emerged again.
cards.name: Ancient Ziggurat
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
This land enters tapped.

cards.flavor: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
-Pulan, Bant orchardist
cards.name: Exotic Orchard
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

cards.text:
As this land enters, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Frontier Bivouac
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.

This land enters tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.
cards.name: Jungle Shrine
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

cards.flavor: Dappled coats become armored hides. Soft jaws become razor tusks. Nestling play becomes the fight for survival.
cards.name: Nesting Grounds
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Move a counter from target permanent you control onto a second target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Opal Palace
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

cards.flavor:
"The people must know that the former seat of their oppression is cleansed. Throw open Qarsi's gates and let them see for themselves."
-Kotis, the Fangkeeper
cards.name: Opulent Palace
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.

cards.name: Path of Ancestry
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.name: Primal Beyond
cards.text:
As this land enters, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or activate an ability of an Elemental.

cards.name: Raging Ravine
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{2}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." It's still a land.

cards.name: Rakdos Carnarium
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{R}.

cards.flavor: Along the outer girders, in gold filigree, are inscribed the names of all those who fell to their deaths during construction.
cards.name: Riveteers Overlook
cards.text: When this land enters, sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Cliffs echo and branches quake at the roar of life.
cards.name: Rootbound Crag
cards.text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.

cards.flavor:
"The most important part of a stronghold isn't its armaments or its walls. It's the reason people have to defend it."
-Gvar Barzeel, krumar captain
cards.name: Sandsteppe Citadel
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.

cards.flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
cards.name: Savage Lands
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

cards.flavor: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
cards.name: Seaside Citadel
cards.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

cards.name: Smoldering Marsh

({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor: The Conflux crashed together far-flung continents, like ships colliding in a storm.
cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.
cards.name: Thriving Bluff
cards.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.

cards.flavor: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.
cards.name: Thriving Grove
cards.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

cards.flavor: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.
cards.name: Thriving Heath
cards.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

cards.flavor: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
cards.name: Thriving Isle
cards.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.

cards.flavor: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.
cards.name: Thriving Moor
cards.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

cards.name: Unclaimed Territory
cards.text:
As this land enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

cards.flavor: Farmers cut the trees and buried their dead. The dead rose up and killed the farmers. The trees grew back and strangled the dead.
